name: Plan It
description:
We weren't able to complete the prototype in time unfortunately, but it was really fun for a first game jam.

There are a couple minor enemy nodes hooked up so the battles do appear, but most of the content hasn't been finished. We're still missing a variety of enemies and cards/attacks so we haven't really gone into balancing anything. Music, SFX, and animations are also pretty lacking.

We hope you enjoy what we have so far and look forward to the progress with this project. Thanks for playing!
